alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Perry; Pope; Van Buren; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 1:15PM CDT until March 31 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Perry County in central Arkansas... South central Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... Conway County in central Arkansas... Northwestern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... East central Yell County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 114 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Adona, or 10 miles west of Perryville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morrilton... Perryville... Atkins... Oppelo... Damascus... Twin Groves... Perry... Adona... Bethlehem... Sequoya Park... Hill Creek... Carden Bottoms... Happy Bend... Solgohachia... Claude... Cleveland... Catholic Point... Hattieville... Middleton... Petit Jean State Park... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Faulkner; Perry; Pope; Van Buren; Yell
